Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: おばあさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Man

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマル
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマル・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: すみません…… うちのおじいさんは よそから来た人が嫌いで……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry, my husband doesn't really like outsiders...

Entry.JapaneseText: ひっ……！
あ、ご、ごめんなさい…… で、でも病気が……
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, I-I'm sorry... The d-disease...

Entry.JapaneseText: 村のみんなが、かたくなな 心をほどいてくれて…… 本当によかったです……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm really glad that everyone's heart has lightened up...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私に近寄らないでください……！ あ、あなたがそばに来るだけで 心が暴れるんです……！
Entry.EnglishText: P-Please don't come any closer! My poor heart starts pounding whenever you get close...!

Entry.JapaneseText: この村もすっかり 変わってしまいました……
Entry.EnglishText: This village has changed completely...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマが 顔を合わせようものなら たちまちケンカが始まります……
Entry.EnglishText: Whenever Huma and Gajuma see each other, there's always bound to be a fight...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうか、お気をつけて……
Entry.EnglishText: Please be careful...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか、少しだけ、 村の雰囲気が落ち着いたような 気がします……
Entry.EnglishText: For some reason, I feel like the village's atmosphere has calmed down somewhat...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私も、ちょっと前よりは 気分が落ち着いています……
Entry.EnglishText: Even my mood has improved compared to before!

Entry.JapaneseText: 村の騒ぎが収まったたら、 今度はこの地響き……
Entry.EnglishText: All that commotion in the village finally calms down, and now the ground itself is trembling...

Entry.JapaneseText: この国はどうなって、 しまったんでしょう……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what's happening to this country...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 世の中はおかしくなって しまいましたが、この村は きっと大丈夫です……
Entry.EnglishText: This world might have gone crazy, but I'm sure this village will be safe...

Entry.JapaneseText: 新しい村になろうと、みんなが 努力し始めたんですから……
Entry.EnglishText: Because everyone has started to make an effort towards improving this village!

Entry.JapaneseText: この村は若い人が少ないです。 若者たちは街にあこがれて この村を出て行きました。
Entry.EnglishText: There's a lot of old people here. All the young ones have left yearning for city life.

Entry.JapaneseText: でもこの村の良さに気づき、 彼らが戻って来るだろう日を 私たちは待ってるのです。
Entry.EnglishText: But I'm waiting for the day when they realize the perks of living here and return.

Entry.JapaneseText: よそ者は好かん！ 出てってもらおう……！
Entry.EnglishText: You outsiders have no place in this village! Leave!

Entry.JapaneseText: よ、寄るな…… 病気がうつる……！
Entry.EnglishText: St-Stand back! I'll catch your illness!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヨソものは いつも厄介事を運んでくる…… それに変わりはない。
Entry.EnglishText: All outsiders like you always bring something horrible! You're all the same!

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃが、困っている者を 見過ごすのは人として 間違いじゃった……
Entry.EnglishText: Yet, I was wrong for turning a blind eye to those in need of help...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……勘弁してくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Forgive me...

Entry.JapaneseText: お、おまえ……近寄るな！ せっかく、ベルデ草のお香で 気分を鎮めておるのに……
Entry.EnglishText: Stand back! I was in a good mood thanks to the Belde grass and then you showed up...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえが近くに来たとたん、 全身の毛が逆立つような怒りが こみ上げて来るんじゃ！
Entry.EnglishText: As soon as you come near me, I get so angry that all my hairs stand on end!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふう……ヒューマと話すと ほっとするわい……
Entry.EnglishText: Haah... Speaking with you Huma is quite relieving.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうもガジュマが近づくだけで 攻撃的になってしまうんじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Just being near Gajuma always make me aggressive.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと以前のように 仲良くやっていけるか……
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think we can get along with Gajuma like before...?

Entry.JapaneseText: これから、それを 探っていかねばの……
Entry.EnglishText: I suppose we'll have to find out...

Entry.JapaneseText: 以前と同じ……関係というのは むずかしいのかもしれんな……
Entry.EnglishText: It might be hard to rebuild the relationship we once had...

Entry.JapaneseText: 互いの憎しみや差別意識を 知ってしまった今となっては…… どうすればよいものやら……
Entry.EnglishText: Now that we're finally aware of each other's hatred and discrimination, I wonder what we should do?

Entry.JapaneseText: 遠くから聞こえるこの地鳴り…… どこかで何か、大変な事が 起きているような気がする……
Entry.EnglishText: This rumbling is coming from somewhere afar... I wonder if something horrible is happening?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマたちが、 ワシに謝って来たんじゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma came and apologized to us...

Entry.JapaneseText: わだかまりがあるのは仕方ないが、 前向きに努力したいと…… もちろん、ワシも同意したよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, some ill will is inevitable, but I want to look at it in a better way... I also forgave them, of course...

Entry.JapaneseText: この村は年寄りが多いんじゃ。 だからみんな、助け合って 生きて行かねばならん……
Entry.EnglishText: There are many seniors in this village, so everyone has to help each other to survive.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい！ ヒューマは入ってくるな！ ここは今日から俺の家だ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey! Huma ain't allowed in here! Starting from today, this house is mine!

Entry.JapaneseText: 今日から……？ どういう事だ？
Entry.EnglishText: From today? What do you mean by that?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマのジジイとババアから 頂いたのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Some Huma geezer and his wife used to own it, but I took it off their hands.

Entry.JapaneseText: そのじいさんとばあさんは どうしたんだ……？
Entry.EnglishText: What happened to them?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ、うるせえな！ 追い出したに決まってるだろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: What're you being so nosy for? I ran them out of town, obviously!

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ……追い出した？ でも、この周りは砂漠しか……
Entry.EnglishText: Wait... You ran them out of town? But there's nothing but desert for miles...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんな危ない砂漠に、 年寄りを放り出したってのかよ！
Entry.EnglishText: You threw an elderly couple out into a desert as dangerous as this one?!

Entry.JapaneseText: どこへ行ったんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Where did they go?

Entry.JapaneseText: た、た、たぶんオアシスに……
Entry.EnglishText: P-Probably to the Oasis...

Entry.JapaneseText: あそこはバイラスの巣窟だ。 普通に暮らす事など……！
Entry.EnglishText: That's where Biruses nest. If they stay there for too long, then...!

Entry.JapaneseText: オアシスへ急ぐぞ……！
Entry.EnglishText: We need to hurry to the Oasis!

Entry.JapaneseText: お、お助け……!!
Entry.EnglishText: H-Help...!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはオアシスにでも 行って、バイラスどもに 食われちまえばいいのさ！
Entry.EnglishText: If Huma stay any longer in the Oasis, they'll get eaten by Biruses!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
